last_episode_to_air.name: Back to Gosan
last_episode_to_air.overview: Seon-u gradually returns to her normal life. One day, she comes home to find that Jun-yeong has disappeared — and all that's left is a note from Tae-o.

name: The World of the Married
overview: A turbulent twister of lies, betrayals and revenge tears apart the seemingly picture-perfect marriage between a doctor and a filmmaker.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Ji Sun Woo is an associate director of a family clinic with a perfect life—a great career, married to a handsome, young-looking man, mother to an adoring son, and surrounded by seemingly caring friends. She couldn't be more content. Lee Tae Oh, her husband, is an aspiring movie director. However, when his temptation leads him to betray Sun Woo along with the people around her, she gets driven to revenge. The perilous twists-and-turns of a married couple's life unfolds.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A turbulent twister of lies, betrayals and revenge tears apart the seemingly picture-perfect marriage between a doctor and a filmmaker.

tagline: She was living her dreams but a betrayal turned her life into a nightmare.

episodes.name: Infidelity
episodes.overview: Ji Seon-u's marital bliss shatters when she spots an unfamiliar strand of hair on Lee Tae-o's scarf. Suspicious, she tails him after work one day.

episodes.name: The Anger Builds
episodes.overview: After making a discovery that shakes her to the core, Seon-u is thrown into a dilemma. Yeo Da-gyeong's visit to her hospital worsens matters.

episodes.name: Legal Advice
episodes.overview: A piece of unexpected news sends Tae-o running to Da-gyeong. Taking advice from a divorce lawyer, Seon-u begins gathering important evidence.

episodes.name: Red Lipstick
episodes.overview: Min Hyeon-seo deals with the return of her boyfriend, who wants to cash in on her efforts. Son Je-hyeok puts forth a risky proposition to Seon-u.

episodes.name: The Unexpected Dinner
episodes.overview: While Tae-o tries to save his affair, Seon-u learns more of his secrets. They head to Da-gyeong's parents' home, where an uneasy dinner ensues.

episodes.name: It’s All Your Fault
episodes.overview: Seon-u and Tae-o's fight turns nasty as they battle over divorce papers and for custody of Lee Jun-yeong, who struggles to process their separation.

episodes.name: I’m Back
episodes.overview: Tae-o and Da-gyeong come back to town and throw an extravagant housewarming party. While everyone gossips about the couple, Seon-u grows anxious.

episodes.name: I’m Not Running
episodes.overview: Seon-u is spooked by a series of strange incidents at home. In addition, she finds out that Jun-yeong has been hiding something from her.

episodes.name: How Much Do You Trust Your Husband?
episodes.overview: Da-kyeong becomes wary of Tae-o's behavior. Before an important meeting with Yeo Byeong-gyu, Seon-u receives a panic-inciting package.

episodes.name: The Runaway
episodes.overview: A series of incriminating photos threatens Ko Ye-rim's marriage. Reeling from a betrayal, Seon-u seeks retaliation by paying Park In-gyu a visit.

episodes.name: Do You Think I Pushed Him?
episodes.overview: After Tae-o comes home in a questionable state, Da-gyeong snoops through his clothes. Hyeon-seo is convinced she knows the culprit's identity.

episodes.name: Boarding School
episodes.overview: When Tae-o is taken by police for questioning, Seon-u does what she thinks is right for her family. Da-gyeong urges Jun-yeong to make a choice.

episodes.name: A Fight at School
episodes.overview: Seon-u is in the midst of considering job openings outside the city when she gets word that Jun-yeong has been involved in a fight at school.

episodes.name: Sun Woo Leaves Gosan
episodes.overview: With both Jun-yeong and her job gone, Seon-u finds herself completely alone. When she goes missing, Kim Yun-gi and Tae-o rush to find her.

episodes.name: Da Kyung’s Last Chance
episodes.overview: Nearing the end of her rope, Da-gyeong demands the truth from Tae-o. Soon after, Seon-u shows her the upsetting reality of Tae-o's patterns.

episodes.name: Back to Gosan
episodes.overview: Seon-u gradually returns to her normal life. One day, she comes home to find that Jun-yeong has disappeared — and all that's left is a note from Tae-o.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A turbulent twister of lies, betrayals and revenge tears apart the seemingly picture-perfect marriage between a doctor and a filmmaker.
